properties.name: spring.mvc.servlet.path
properties.description: Base api URL for the element.

properties.name: element.displayName
properties.description: Element's name to be displayed in the UI.

properties.name: element.icon
properties.description: Element's icon to be displayed in the UI.

properties.name: function.commandable
properties.description: Enable the commandable functionality for the element.

properties.name: function.configurable
properties.description: Enable the configurable functionality for the element.

properties.name: function.diagnosible
properties.description: Enable the diagnosible functionality for the element.

properties.name: function.switchable
properties.description: Enable the switchable functionality for the element.
